name: Director of Product
description:
We are looking for a Director of product for our game development company.

Who are we?

We are a team of ambitious professionals with experience in such companies as Glu Mobile (part of Electronic Arts), Scopely, Wargaming, Mail.ru etc., founded in 2021. Now we have 45+ team members, who love to play games, not less than create it. We are growing fast and result-oriented.

Our ideal employees are hardworking and self-motivated. Our culture is based on hard work, high responsibility, and always doing the right thing for our community. If this description sounds like a team you'd like to join, keep reading.

Our mission:

We provide the ability for players all over the world to earn cryptocurrencies for a living by playing quality and fun games without downloading content, just by sharing a link to the game with friends in any messenger. Read more on our website - https://faraway.gg

What are we doing?

Mini Royale: Nations is a community-owned skill-based shooter set on top of an ever-evolving social strategy game. You can join the game right now - https://miniroyale.io/

We believe in an open economy, true digital ownership, and most importantly, that "FUN" is valuable.

Current Status:

We already have sustainable and reliable financing, and we have a clear roadmap for the next 2 years, which we're implementing step by step. Let's do it together!

What's important to us:

  • Must be passionate about games and the interaction of blockchain and gaming;

  • 10+ years of experience as a PM or Data Analyst on a successful free-to-play game or highly social consumer product;

  • Expert understanding of game system and economy design and player psychology;

  • Ability to work closely with technical teams to design and implement features and systems that our community will love;

  • Advanced Excel/Economy Modeling, Data Visualization, and Presentation skills;

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Statistics / Economics / Finance, or another quantitative field;

  • Love for games.

What would be helpful:

  • Deep understanding of midcore free-to-play games and live ops;

  • Experience contributing to risk and profitability decisions in a marketplace setting;

  • Masters or PhD in Economics with a focus on Mechanism Design.

Responsibilities, what to do:

  • Conceptualise, design, and prepare documentation and user stories for new features and content including game modes, meta progression, rule-based events, among others;

  • Develop a deep understanding of our players: their problems, their needs, their desires, and translate them into exceptional experiences;

  • Work with Producers to schedule and scope features, providing them with the necessary system design documentation and mockups to deliver to art, engineering, and QA teams;

  • Leverage business intelligence, user analytics, and quant+qual analysis to monitor the fun and health of the game, economy, and community; prioritize product features that promote retention and long-term economic health;

  • Research the latest blockchain and free-to-play design models and implement these best practices into the economy;

  • Work hard and lead by example.

Working conditions:

  • Prospects for professional and career growth and development;

  • Good salary and bonuses;

  • Salary is paid on a card or account in Ukraine, Russia, USA, EU;

  • Full-time, 5/2;

  • Distributed around the world team working in the MSC + - 2-3 hours;

  • Registration of an agreement in accordance with the Labor Code of the Russian Federation / civil law contract or another option;

  • Friendly young team of well-rounded technical and humanitarian success-oriented people;

  • Close-knit team built on the principles of mutual respect and mutual support;

  • Democratic leadership and clear communication;

  • The opportunity not only to work and earn, but also to learn something new.

Interview in Russian or English
